caption.p: % Glucose level inhibition of sitagliptin and dapagliflozin from normal control, diabetic (STZ) control, diabetic (STZ) + THQ, diabetic (STZ) + DN, diabetic (STZ) + SN, diabetic (STZ) + DN + SN (F1-SNEDDS-BSO/CMCM/CrEL [15/35/50] %w/w combined dose), diabetic (STZ) + marketed drug. STZ: streptozotocin; SN: sitagliptin; DN: dapagliflozin; THQ: thymoquinone. Data are presented as (Mean ± SEM, n = 3).
